concept.title: About the ETM
concept.shortdesc: The ETM trace unit is a module that performs real-time instruction flow tracing based on the ETMv4 architecture. The ETM is a CoreSight component, and is an integral part of the Arm Real-time Debug solution, DS-5 Development Studio.

section.p: See the Arm Embedded Trace Macrocell Architecture Specification ETMv4 for more information.
